comments: Held for First year students. Appropriate for students with prior calculus-based physics course such as an AP or IB course.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Previous completion or concurrent registration in Mathematics 120 or 121. Not open to students who have completed Physics 131, 143, 145 or 151 at Carleton.
subject: PHYS
title: Astrophysical Systems: Mechanics and Relativity and Lab
